price: Na mwanaadamu tunapo mneemesha hugeuka na kujitenga kando. Na inapo mgusa shari hukata tamaa.
arabic: قُلۡ كُلّٞ يَعۡمَلُ عَلَىٰ شَاكِلَتِهِۦ فَرَبُّكُمۡ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَنۡ هُوَ أَهۡدَىٰ سَبِيلٗا
footnotes: Ewe Nabii! Waambie makafiri wa Kikureshi kwa kuepuka kuchochea ugomvi na makindano: Kila mmoja wetu na mmoja wenu anatenda na anakwenda kwa kufuata njia yake. Na Mola wenu Mlezi ni Mjuzi mno, wala hana ajuaye kuliko Yeye kumjua nani aliye shika njia sawa na kufuata Haki. Na huyo humlipa ujira wake kaamili. Na kumjua aliye potea njia, na huyo humpa adhabu kama anayo stahiki.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qul kullun yaʿmalu ʿalā shākilatihi farabbukum aʿlamu biman huwa ahdā sabīlan
